text: to hamane usakee or vahî€¼yee kee ki naav bana hamaaree raksha mein hamaaree vahyee ke anusaar aur jab hamaara aadesh aa jaaye tatha tannoor ubal pade, to rakh le pratyek jeev ke ek-ek jode tatha apane parivaar ko, usake siva jisapar pahale nirnay ho chuka hai unamen se, aur mujhe sambodhit na karana unake vishay mein jinhonne atyaachaar kiye hain, nishchay ve dubo diye jaayenge
